title: In what situations will the indicator turn on?
answer:
When you receive a new SMS message or miss a phone call, the indicator will blink. 

 When there is a notification from an application, the indicator will blink. 

 When you connect to computer with a USB cable or connect to a charger, the indicator will turn on. 

 The indicator light colors indicate the following: red for low power, orange for medium power, green for 90% or more power.
